title: OCE Open Ladder D3+ Mid or ADC Sub Required
body: Imperious is looking for MID or ADC primary laner sub for the upcoming open ladder, must be able to play all 14 Qualifiers and be available to play games on a daily basis for scrimming. Our primary ADC may miss some games so may be a primary role.

replies.body: I'd like to join. Although I'm only Gold IV, I've played on many diamond and up teams. I'm a Kat main, however I'm ready to adjust to what the team needs. I have knowledge of every champ and play many with good success. Add me if you're interested.
